alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 5:53PM CDT until July 04 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Greenwood County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamilton, or 7 miles south of Madison, moving east to southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Hamilton, Virgil, Eureka City Lake, Eureka Airport and Thrall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
